trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were 5 other sightings in Los Angeles on or around January 1st 2012
divs: sighting detailsso me & my little bro & sister were outside my aunts house since it was new years 2012, hmm i suppose sometime between 12:00 a.m thru 12:15.. we were outside on the street when we were watching fireworks down the street, when one red glowing fireball one appeared, it stood out since me & my brother waited about 5-10 seconds for what we thought was a firework to explode, but no.. & thats when me & him started 'tripping out' asking 'wtf is that' at 1st we thought it was a firework but we saw other fireworks going off fast.. but then we saw it kinda going towards us not literally to us.. but our direction.. and as it started getting closer we saw it was or had 3 orange\red kinda fireballs inside so then we said 'holy sh!t ' lets go lets go "" and yeah it dissapeared right infront our eyes, of course my little sister whos 2 doesnt know what that is. but since im 16 & my brothers 9, we knew that definitely was not a firework, unfortunately i didnt think of recording the thing with my ipod camera... darn :| either way, i know its not a firework & yes i'm traumatized :o
Summary: fireball looking red gaslight with 3 orange colored orb looking fireballs
